content: the 1 chain created 1 st total of 50st was made time to fill the legs with stuffing before moving to the body part 3 4 body continue working in rounds round 17 50sc around 50 st round 18 1inc 9sc x 5 55 st round 19 to 22 single_crochet around 55 st jumper change colour to green and begin crocheting the jumper round 23 single_crochet in all 55 st 55 st round 24 single_crochet in all 55st change colour to green round 43 single_crochet in all 30 st 30 st 5 6 head change to brown yarn and continue working on the head round 44 single_crochet in all 30 st blo 30 st round 45 single_crochet in all 30 st 30 st round 46 5sc 1inc x 5 35 st round 47 single_crochet in all 35 st 35 st round 48 6sc 1inc x 5 40 st round 49 single_crochet in all 40 st 40 st round 50 7sc 1inc x 5 45 st round 50 to 56 single_crochet in all 45 st 45 st remember to add stuffing as you go insert the safety eyes between round 53 and 54 leaving 8-9 stitches between them position of the eyes is really up to your liking i do however always try to get them in the middle of the head spread wide round 57 7sc 1dec x 5 40 st round 58 single_crochet in all 40 st 40 st round 59 6sc 1dec x 5 35 st round 60 5sc 1dec x 5 30 st round 61 3sc 1dec x 6 24 st round 62 2sc 1dec x 6 18 st round 63 1sc 1dec x 6 12 st round 64 1sc 1dec x 3 6 st cut off the yarn leaving a long tail add a bit more stuffing before closing the seam weave the yarn in front loops of the rest 6 stitches and pull tight to close the
